---

# idsec_sia_certificate (Resource)

SIA Certificate resource, manages a certificate in SIA that is used for connections.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `cert_body` (String) Certificate body content
- `cert_description` (String) Description of the certificate
- `cert_name` (String) Name of the certificate
- `cert_password` (String) Encryption password for certificate
- `cert_type` (String) Certificate type (PEM,DER)
- `certificate_body` (String) Certificate body content
- `certificate_id` (String) The ID of the certificate to update.
- `checksum` (String) Checksum calculated from the certificate content
- `created_by` (String) Author of the certificate entry
- `domain_name` (String) Domain to which the certificate is assigned
- `expiration_date` (String) Time when certificate will expire
- `file` (String) Path to a file with the certificate body
- `labels` (Dynamic) Additional labels assigned to the certificate
- `last_updated_by` (String) Author of last certificate entry update
- `metadata` (Attributes) Metadata of the certificate (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `tenant_id` (String) ID of the tenant
- `updated_time` (String) Datetime of the last certificate update
- `version` (Number) Version of the certificate

<a id="nestedatt--metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `metadata`

Optional:

- `issuer` (String) The issuer of the certificate.
- `serial_number` (String) The serial number of the certificate.
- `subject` (String) The subject of the certificate.
- `valid_from` (String) The start date of the certificate's validity period.
- `valid_to` (String) The end date of the certificate's validity period.
